definitions.definition: The art movement towards conceptual art .

A theory , intermediate between realism and nominalism , that the mind has the power of forming for itself general conceptions of individual or single objects; the doctrine that universals have an existence in the mind apart from any concrete embodiment .

main_definition: The art movement towards conceptual art .
secondary_definitions: ( philosophy ) A theory , intermediate between realism and nominalism , that the mind has the power of forming for itself general conceptions of individual or single objects; the doctrine that universals have an existence in the mind apart from any concrete embodiment .
